City Planner

Why are systems developped around luxuries? That, is a question that is consistently asked by those living in the new systems of an empire. Once you go to an established system, one that is already developped, the answer becomes clear. System development is irreversible, and can cause many problems if not handled properly, as seen in the older systems, the luxury standard simply stops to elevate after a while once all it's implications have been found. However, to remedy to this problem one needs to use luxurious luxuries but the cost is simply probitive... Up until now. The city planner is able to change the shape or form of raw luxuries, so that from a lower amount of luxuries, more can be done.

Perfection of the Perfected

The studies around heroes and dust have been yielding good results. The heroes themselves have benefited tremendously from these studies, and are now regarded as beings of almost unparalled beauty, after the First of course, and with beauty comes strength. With this beauty they have been enhanced, with this strength they shine like a beacon in this galaxy riddled with war. As perception is combined with strength, the abilities of heroes multiplied and due to being the most beautiful, the rewards are yours for the taking.
